name: reldmress

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cress, universe, universe, cif(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))), wss(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
stmt.pretty: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cress, universe, universe, if((Base ` hs0)⊆ hs1, hs0,(hs0[sSet]<(Base ` ndx),(hs1 ⋂(Base ` hs0))>)))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cress))
-| wceq(cress, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cif(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cin(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))), wss(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(|`s))
⊣ |`s =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ if((Base ` hs0)⊆ hs1, hs0,(hs0[sSet]<(Base ` ndx),(hs1 ⋂(Base ` hs0))>)))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)

comment: The structure restriction is a proper operator, so it can be used with ~ ovprc1 . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Nov-2014.)
